statements: UPDATE MachineLearningModels SET model_name='Logistic Regression', model_accuracy=0.85 WHERE model_id=1;
UPDATE MachineLearningModels SET training_data_size=1000, model_description='Decision Tree Classifier' WHERE model_id=2;
UPDATE MachineLearningModels SET model_name = 'Linear Regression', model_description = 'A simple regression model', model_accuracy = 0.85, training_data_size = 1000 WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE MachineLearningModels SET training_time = '2022-08-15 10:30:00', model_type = 'Classification', model_accuracy = 0.92 WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest';
UPDATE Machine_Learning_Models SET model_name = 'Logistic Regression', model_accuracy = 0.87 WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE Model_Results SET result_metric = 'F1 Score', result_value = 0.92 WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE Machine_Learning_Models SET model_name = 'Neural Network', model_accuracy = 0.92 WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE Model_Results SET result_metric = 'F1 Score', result_value = 0.85 WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE model_inputs SET input_name = 'New Input Name', input_data = '{"updated": true}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE model_metadata SET model_description = 'This is the updated description' WHERE model_name = 'Model A';
UPDATE model_inputs SET input_data = '{"key1": "value1", "key2": 123, "key3": [1, 2, 3]}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE model_metadata SET model_description = 'Updated model description' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET model_name = 'Linear Regression' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.75 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';

UPDATE machine_learning_models SET model_description = 'Updated model description' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE training_data SET data_accuracy = 0.87 WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET accuracy = 0.85, model_description = 'Updated model description' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE hyperparameters SET parameter_value = 'new_value' WHERE model_id = 2 AND parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
